name: Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc.
description: Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc. is a Canadian company focused on the sustainable production of natural graphite. Founded in 2012, the company is dedicated to developing a vertically integrated supply chain for graphite that meets the growing demand for clean technologies, particularly in electric vehicles (EVs) and renewable energy storage. With its flagship project, the Matawinie graphite mine located in Quebec, Nouveau Monde is positioned to become a key player in the North American battery supply chain. The company emphasizes environmental stewardship and sustainability, utilizing innovative methods to minimize ecological impact throughout its operations. As the demand for battery-grade graphite surges due to the increasing adoption of EVs, Nouveau Monde is committed to providing high-quality graphite while adhering to stringent environmental and social governance standards. The company's mission is to support the transition to a low-carbon economy by providing essential materials for clean technology applications, thereby contributing to a more sustainable future.
